document_data.name: Gabe
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gabe''' was a commoner son of [[Emmet]] from the [[Baldur's Gate/Rivington|Rivington]] district of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''The monster thing is scary. Will you go first? Thanks.''|Gabe}}
document_data.Description: Gabe was a [[human]] child with raven-black hair and brown eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Emmet and his son set out to watch a performance by a beloved clown â€“ [[Dribbles]], of the [[Circus of the Last Days]]. Due to the recently skyrocketed crime and unrest, the circus gates were guarded by [[wood elf]] [[Klaus]] and his trained [[ghoul]] partner [[Benji (ghoul)|Benji]], who sniffed out blood on the hands of the guests. Gabe, however, was afraid of the [[undead]] monster and hesitated to enter.
